original_text: Then fled Moses at this saying, and was a stranger in the land of Madian, where he begat two sons.
korean_text: 모세가 이 말 때문에 도주하여 미디안 땅에서 나그네 되어 거기서 아들 둘을 낳으니라

sentences.original_text: Then fled Moses at this saying,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 모세는 이 말을 듣고 도망쳤으며,

sentences.original_text: and was a stranger in the land of Madian,
